**Owned by **Teva**, an American-Israeli Pharmaceutical Company**

Note:

Hospitals in Gaza are facing a shortage of medical supplies. Humanitarian aid is based on the principles of humanity, impartiality, neutrality, and independence. The principle of humanity entails taking initiatives to alleviate human suffering, regardless of where it occurs, with particular attention to the most vulnerable. The dignity of all victims must be respected and protected. The principle of impartiality means that humanitarian aid can only be provided based on need, without discrimination between or within affected ethnic groups.

name: CARITA
description:
**CARITA** is owned by **L'Oreal.**

**34.70%** of L'Oreal is owned by Mrs. Francoise Bettencourt Meyers and her family. **20.1%** of L' Oreal is owned by **Nestle**. Nestle began **investing** in **Israel** in 1995 by buying 10% of Israeli food maker **Osem** Investments, increasing its ownership to 50.1% two years later giving it the controlling share and now owns a 53.8 percent stake in Osem Swiss food giant Nestle will set up a global research and development center for snack foods next year in Sderot, a town in Israel's Negev desert, the Maariv.[^1]

[^1]: https://www.loreal-finance.com/eng/share-ownership

name: Carmel Agrexco

Don't buy dates from this brand.
Ask businesses to stop selling this brand

[^1]: https://www.ampalestine.org/dateboycott

Note:

Hospitals in Gaza are facing a shortage of medical supplies. Humanitarian aid is based on the principles of humanity, impartiality, neutrality, and independence. The principle of humanity entails taking initiatives to alleviate human suffering, regardless of where it occurs, with particular attention to the most vulnerable.
